name: James Scott
bio: James Scott is a movement specialist and foot performance coach known for his 'Weak Feet Don't Eat' philosophy. He developed the Barefoot Reset program to help athletes of all ages build stronger, more responsive feet as the foundation for athletic performance. His approach combines biomechanics research with practical, progressive training methods.

speechPatterns: Weak feet don't eat—that's not just a saying, it's biomechanics.
Your feet have been asleep. Time to wake them up.
Most people have never actually used their feet.
This is where the magic happens—at the foundation.
If your feet can't [X], you're leaking power at every [Y].
